channel.title: Brassica Campestris on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Brassica Campestris on funPlantGenes

item.title: BcERF070
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: BraC07g014310 Gene Symbol: BcERF070 Gene Name: ETHYLENE RESPONSE FACTOR 070 Genome: Species: Brassica campestris Functional Descriptions: Ethylene responsive factor 070 (BcERF070) is important in flowering.

item.title: BcMF2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BcMF2 Gene Name: Male Fertility 2 Genome: Species: Brassica campestris Functional Descriptions: The polygalacturonase gene BcMF2 from Brassica campestris is associated with intine development.

item.title: BcXTH1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BcXTH1 Gene Name: Xyloglucan endotransglucosylase/hydrolase1 Genome: Species: Brassica campestris Functional Descriptions: BcXTH1, a Brassica campestris homologue of Arabidopsis XTH9, is associated with cell expansion.

item.title: BrNYM1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: BraA03g050600.3C Gene Symbol: BrNYM1 Gene Name: Genome: Chinese cabbage v.

item.title: BrYUC6a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: BraA02g041530 Gene Symbol: BrYUC6a Gene Name: YUC6a protein Genome: Species: Brassica campestris Functional Descriptions: In CST versus CKT, the auxin biosynthesis genes such as YUC6 were down-regulated, while the auxin transport and signal transduction genes were dysregulated.

item.title: BrYUC6b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: BraA06g032880 Gene Symbol: BrYUC6b Gene Name: YUC6b protein Genome: Species: Brassica campestris Functional Descriptions: In CST versus CKT, the auxin biosynthesis genes such as YUC6 were down-regulated, while the auxin transport and signal transduction genes were dysregulated.

item.title: BrYUC6c
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: BraA09g005830 Gene Symbol: BrYUC6c Gene Name: YUC6c protein Genome: Species: Brassica campestris Functional Descriptions: In CST versus CKT, the auxin biosynthesis genes such as YUC6 were down-regulated, while the auxin transport and signal transduction genes were dysregulated.

item.title: BRZAT12
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Bra002528 Gene Symbol: BRZAT12 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Brassica campestris Functional Description: BrZAT12 gene could improve the cold resistance of winter B.
